LanguageData.AllowCorpsesColonist.label: 入植者の死骸を許可
LanguageData.AllowCorpsesColonist.description: 死んだ元入植者を許可する
LanguageData.AllowCorpsesStranger.label: 不審者の死骸を許可
LanguageData.AllowCorpsesStranger.description: 死んだ元不審者や敵を許可する
LanguageData.AllowRotten.label: 腐乱死体を許可
LanguageData.AllowRotten.description: 腐りかけの有機体も許可する
LanguageData.AllowNonSmeltableWeapons.label: allow non-smeltable
LanguageData.AllowNonSmeltableWeapons.description: Allow weapons which can't be smelted.
LanguageData.AllowPlantFood.label: allow plant food
LanguageData.AllowPlantFood.description: Allow foods that are of quality equivalent to unharvested plants, like hay.
